Package main.java.it.unipr.controller

package main.java.it.unipr.controller
Provides different classes used to manage the graphic pages of the application.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BoatsController
    The class BoatsController supports the display of all boats.
    FeesController
    The class FeesController supports the display of all fees.
    LoginController
    The class LoginController supports the login of a user in the application.
    MainController
    The class MainController supports the menu and the notification counter.
    NotificationsController
    The class NotificationsController supports the display of all notifications.
    NotifyPaymentController
    The class NotifyPaymentController supports the section to notify a payment.
    PayFeeController
    The class PayFeeController supports the section to pay a fee.
    PaymentsController
    The class PaymentsController supports the display of all payments.
    RaceRegistrationsController
    The class RegistrationsController supports the display of all race registrations.
    RacesController
    The class RacesController supports the display of all races.
    UpdateFeeController
    The class UpdateFeeController supports the section for the updating a fee.
    UpsertBoatController
    The class UpsertBoatController supports the section for the insertion or updating of a boat.
    UpsertRaceController
    The class UpsertRaceController supports the section for the insertion or updating of a race.
    UpsertRaceRegistrationController
    The class UpsertBoatRegisterController supports the section for the insertion or updating of a race registration.
    UpsertUserController
    The class CreateUserController supports the section for the creation or updating of an user.
    UsersController
    The class UsersController supports the display of all users.
